Product Factory Course Instances Session: xpath=//*[@title='You have not completed all the session timing information']/ancestor::td//button
Direct App I Am Happy To Receive Informa: xpath=//label[normalize-space()='I am happy to receive information from BPP']
Diret App Do You Meet Eligilibility Crit: xpath=//div[text()='Do you confirm that you meet the eligibility criteria?']/div[1]/label[1]
Direct App Final Award In Relation To Pr: xpath=//p[contains(text(),'Have you graduated/accepted a final award in relation to this programme?')]/../div[1]/label[2]
Direct App Ten Working Days To Submit Ap: xpath=//span[contains(text(),'If you do not supply this, your application will be rejected.')]/../following-sibling::div/label[1]
Direct App Application Accepted Message: xpath=//span[contains(.,'Your application was successful. A member of our team will contact you shortly')]
Direct App Bespoke Enrolled On Another A: xpath=//*[contains(text(),'Will you be enrolled on another apprenticeship, or another Department for Education (DfE)')]/../div[1]//label[2]
Direct App Additional Info Aged 19: xpath=//label[contains(.,'aged 19+ and have not been in the care ')]
Direct App Are You Working At Least 16 H: xpath=//div[text()='Are you working for at least 16 hours a week?']//label[1]
Direct App Right To Work in England?: xpath=//*[text()='Do you have the right to work in England?']/../div[1]//label[1]
Direct App Do You Spend 50 Percent: xpath=//*[text()='Do you spend at least 50% of your working hours in England?']/../div[1]//label[1]
Direct App Are You In Employment: xpath=//div[text()='Are you in employment/have a contract of employment, for the duration of the apprenticeship, on the first day of the apprenticeship, and are you paid at least a wage consistent with the law for both the time you are in work and in off-the-job learning?']//label[1]
BPP Digital RFI Form Apprenticeship Levy: xpath=//label[normalize-space()='Are you an Apprenticeship Levy payer?']/../following-sibling::div/div[1]
Totara Add Activity Top Key: xpath=(//a[contains(.,'Topic to test adding activities')]//following::h4[contains(.,'Top Key Activity')]//following-sibling::table//td[contains(.,'Add Activity')]/a)[1]
Totara Add Activity Bottom Key: xpath=(//a[contains(.,'Topic to test adding activities')]//following::h4[contains(.,'Bottom Key Activity')]//following-sibling::table//td[contains(.,'Add Activity')]/a)[1]
Totara Automation Topic Add an Activity: xpath=//span[@data-editlabel='New name for topic Automation']/following::span[contains(text(),'Add an activity or resource')][1]
Guerilla Your MC Are Now Reviewed: xpath=//tbody[@id='email_list']//td[contains(.,'Your Mitigating Circumstances are now being reviewed')]
Guerilla Your MC Referred: xpath=//tbody[@id='email_list']//td[contains(.,'Your Mitigating Circumstances application has been referred')]
Guerilla Your MC Accepted: xpath=//tbody[@id='email_list']//td[contains(.,'Your Mitigating Circumstances application has been accepted')]
Proctorio Login Link: xpath=//span[text()='You are not logged in. (']/a[text()='Log in']
